QueryResult.text: SELECT FV.COST, FV.REVENUE, FV.CURRENCY_CODE, CL.LOOKUP_CODE AS FORECAST_TYPE, FP.PERIOD_TYPE AS PERIOD_TYPE, FP.PROJECT_ID AS PROJECT_ID, FP.REVISION AS REVISION, CP.ID AS PERIOD_ID FROM PAC_FRC_FORECAST_PROPERTIES FP, PAC_FRC_FORECAST_DETAILS FD, PAC_FRC_FORECAST_VALUES FV, BIZ_COM_PERIODS CP, CMN_LOOKUPS CL WHERE FD.FORECAST_ID = FP.ID AND FV.FORECAST_DETAILS_ID = FD.ID AND FV.CURRENCY_TYPE = FP.CURRENCY_TYPE AND CP.ID = FD.PERIOD_ID AND CL.LOOKUP_TYPE = 'PAC_FRC_FORECAST_TYPE' AND FP.FORECAST_TYPE = CL.ID
